hero.title: About propertybyta168
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive real estate consultancy in Bangkok. Providing buy-sell-rent services, property management, and professional investment management with the goal to "Elevate your real estate experience beyond others in the market."

story.title: About Us
story.paragraph1: We view real estate not just as buying and selling, but as planning, investing, and making important life decisions.
story.paragraph2: We have developed a service system that meets the needs of investors, general individuals, foreigners, as well as project owners who want a management team that can deliver real results.
story.paragraph3: propertybyta168 – Making your real estate decisions easier and delivering real results.

valuesSection.title: What We're Expert At
valuesSection.subtitle: Comprehensive services designed to meet your real estate investment needs.

trust.title: Buy-Sell-Rent Bangkok Real Estate
trust.description: We analyze location, market prices, deals, and growth opportunities to help clients make informed decisions.

excellence.title: Rental Management & Property Care
excellence.description: Professional rental management services including income, expenses, maintenance, and return reporting.

community.title: Investment Consultation for Thai & Foreign Investors
community.description: Structuring property ownership, rental, ROI calculations, with proper legal guidance for foreigners.

advisory.title: Project Analysis & Real Estate Development
advisory.description: Collaborate on sales strategies, marketing, and pricing to help projects close sales quickly and sustainably.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Clients Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: What makes propertybyta168 different from competitors in the market.

marketKnowledge.title: Deep & Real Understanding of Bangkok Market
marketKnowledge.description: We have in-depth knowledge of the Bangkok real estate market, including locations, prices, and growth opportunities.

experience.title: Extensive Experience with Foreign Investors
experience.description: We understand the needs and legal requirements for foreign investors thoroughly.

professional.title: Professional Team Focused on Results
professional.description: Everyone on our team is committed to creating the best results for clients.

service.title: Fast Service, Treating Properties Like Our Own
service.description: We value your property as if it were our own, with fast and professional service.

teamSection.title: Meet Our Team
teamSection.subtitle: Our dedicated professionals are here to guide you through every step of your property journey.

ceo.name: Somchai Tanawat
ceo.description: With over 20 years of experience in real estate, Somchai leads our team with vision and dedication to excellence.

director.name: Napat Siriwan
director.description: Napat brings 15 years of expertise in luxury property sales, helping clients find their perfect investment.

manager.name: Krit Pattana
manager.description: Krit ensures all our listings meet the highest standards and provides expert market insights to our clients.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Ready to serve and answer all your questions
contactPage.scanQr: Scan QR Code to contact us via Line
contactPage.followUsDesc: Stay updated with our latest news and promotions
contactPage.faq1A: Our office is open Monday - Sunday from 09:00 - 18:00.
contactPage.faq2Q: What documents do I need for renting or buying?
contactPage.faq2A: For renting: ID copy, 3 months salary slips / For buying: ID copy, house registration, 6 months bank statement
contactPage.faq3Q: How can I schedule a viewing?
contactPage.faq3A: Contact us via phone or Line Official, and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.
contactPage.faq4A: No brokerage fees for tenants. Buyers and sellers have industry-standard brokerage fees. Please contact us for details.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Property by Ta 168 ("we", "us", "our") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our website propertybyta168.com and our services.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We may collect the following personal information:
collection.item1: Name and contact information (phone number, email, Line ID)
collection.item2: Property information you are interested in or wish to list
collection.item3: Website usage data (IP address, browser type, pages visited)
collection.item4: Information you provide through contact or inquiry forms

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your personal information to:
usage.item1: Provide property search and recommendation services matching your needs
usage.item2: Contact you regarding properties you're interested in or services you requested
usage.item3: Send news, promotions, and special offers (with your consent)
usage.item4: Improve and develop our website and services

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure, including data encryption, access controls, and staff training.

sharing.title: Third-Party Disclosure
sharing.content: We will not sell, exchange, or transfer your personal information to third parties except:
sharing.item2: To comply with laws, regulations, or court orders
sharing.item3: When necessary for service delivery (e.g., contacting property owners)

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under Thailand's Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA), you have the right to:
rights.item1: Access and obtain a copy of your personal data
rights.item2: Request correction of inaccurate personal data
rights.item3: Request deletion or destruction of your personal data
rights.item4: Object to the processing of your personal data in certain cases

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience, analyze website usage, and display relevant content. You can adjust your browser settings to refuse cookies, but this may affect some website functionality.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using propertybyta168.com, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any terms, please stop using the website immediately.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: Property by Ta 168 provides intermediary services for buying, selling, and renting real estate. Our services include:
services.item1: Displaying properties available for sale or rent
services.item3: Coordinating between buyers/renters and property owners
services.item4: Property listing services for sale and rent

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: When using our website and services, you agree to:
responsibilities.item1: Provide accurate, complete, and current information
responsibilities.item2: Not use the website for illegal purposes
responsibilities.item3: Not take any action that may damage the website or other users
responsibilities.item4: Not copy, modify, or distribute website content without permission

propertyInfo.title: Property Information
propertyInfo.content: Property information displayed on the website comes from property owners and external sources. While we strive to verify accuracy, we do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of all information. You should verify information directly with property owners before making decisions.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: Content, images, logos, and other components on this website are intellectual property of Property by Ta 168 or its licensors. Copying, reproducing, modifying, or distributing without written permission is prohibited.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Property by Ta 168 shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of our website or services, including direct, indirect, or special damages, whether from contract, tort, or any other cause.

termination.title: Service Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to our website and services without prior notice if you violate these Terms of Service or take any action that may harm us or other users.

law.title: Governing Law
law.content: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Thailand. Any disputes shall be subject to Thai court jurisdiction.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting on the website. Continued use of the website after changes constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
